settings.rich_text:
Simple Steps to compete:

  1. Order above ₹2499.
  2. Follow us on Instagram.
  3. Answer a few questions below.

settings.question: 1. Which Coldplay album features the hit single "Viva La Vida"?
settings.options: Parachutes, Rush of Blood to the Head, X&Y,  Viva la Vida or Death and All His Friends

settings.question: 2. What year did Coldplay release their debut album "Parachutes"?
3. Which Coldplay song includes the lyrics "Look at the stars, look how they shine for you"?
4. Who is the lead vocalist of Coldplay?
settings.options: Guy Berryman, Jonny Buckland, Will Champion, Chris Martin

settings.question: 5. Which Coldplay song was inspired by Chris Martin's separation from Gwyneth Paltrow?
6. Which Coldplay album introduced the single "Hymn for the Weekend"?
settings.options: Mylo Xyloto, Ghost Stories, A Head Full of Dreams, Everyday Life

settings.question: 7. What is the title of Coldplay's collaborative album with Beyoncé?
settings.options: "Ghost Stories", "A Head Full of Dreams", "Music of the Spheres", "Coldplay X BTS

settings.label: 8. Describe how Coldplay's music has influenced or inspired you personally. Share your thoughts on what being a Coldplay fan means to you and how their songs have impacted your life.

settings.rich_text: ⚠︎ To all Concerts fans: This giveaway is only for genuine entries! Any use of AI for the any section will lead to instant disqualification. We want to hear your unique love for Coldplay, not a robot’s!"

settings.form_description: As a Coldplay fan missed booking a Concert Ticket, we got you covered. Participate and WIN a Ticket to Music of Spheres.
